description: This Java source file defines the class 'LegacySecurityDeviceStatusEvent', which extends 'LegacyApsAckedCommandEvent'. It contains logic for constructing payloads for legacy security device status events, including device information and sensor readings, used within a simulated Zigbee environment.

classes.name: LegacySecurityDeviceStatusEvent
classes.description: Represents a legacy security device status event, capable of generating the payload bytes for transmission based on device data.

methods.name: LegacySecurityDeviceStatusEvent(String eui64, int endpointId, MockLegacySecurityCluster cluster, boolean isCheckin)
methods.description: Constructor initializing the event with device identifiers, cluster data, and check-in status.

methods.name: LegacySecurityDeviceStatusEvent(String eui64, int endpointId, MockLegacySecurityCluster cluster)
methods.description: Constructor initializing the event with device identifiers and cluster data, defaulting check-in to false.

methods.name: protected byte[] getCommandPayload()
methods.description: Generates the command payload bytes based on device cluster data, adjusting size depending on the endpoint.
